sections.heading: of act.The purpose of the Unfair Discrimination Against Subjects of Abuse in Insurance Act is to prohibit unfair discrimination by insurers on the basis of abuse

sections.text:
44-7403.Purpose of act.

The purpose of the Unfair Discrimination Against Subjects of Abuse in Insurance Act is to prohibit unfair discrimination by insurers on the basis of abuse.

SourceLaws 1998, LB 1035, ยง 16.
